item.title: LEGO City Cargo Train Toy with Motorized Remote Control Engine incl. Rail Tracks Signal Lights & Control Center - 6-12 Year Old Boys & Girls Gifts - 60198

ℹ️:

  • The Cargo Train set for kids aged 6+ years old features a battery powered train toy with 4 cars, plus a control centre, armoured truck and forklift toys
  • Kids can push the lever on the LEGO train track switch to drive the remote control train toy to a different track for loading or unloading
